name: King of the Crumbs
description:
This is a submission to Mini Jam 99 - Birds!! *this game has a bug with the health packs, they work well... sometimes too well?"

Take control of Kevin, a young pigeon on his way yo be crowned king of the crumbs!!

Move with the arrow keys use Z or X to shoot. Try not to die and have fun!!

!! PRESSING QUIT ON THE GAME OVER MENU FREEZES THE GAME SORRY FOLKS !!

All the music is owned by Eggy Toast I do not own the rights to any music that you hear in this project if you would like to support that creator I've linked they're page below

https://freemusicarchive.org/music/eggy-toast
